    • Method Detail

      • determineDateFormat

        public static java.lang.String determineDateFormat(java.lang.String dateString)
        Determine SimpleDateFormat pattern matching with the given date string. Returns null if format is unknown. You can simply extend DateUtil with more formats if needed.
        Parameters:
        dateString - The date string to determine the SimpleDateFormat pattern for.
        Returns:
        The matching SimpleDateFormat pattern, or null if format is unknown.
        See Also:
        SimpleDateFormat

      • parseDate

        public static java.util.Date parseDate(java.lang.String dateString)
        Get a Date object from a date String
        Parameters:
        dateString - The String date to attempt to parse
        Returns:
        The Date object representing this date

      • reformatDate

        public static java.lang.String reformatDate(java.lang.String dateString,
                                            java.lang.String formatString)
        Change a date from its existing format to one of your choice
        Parameters:
        dateString - The String date to attempt to parse
        formatString - The SimpleDateFormat String you want the date in
        Returns:
        The newly formatted date as a String
        See Also:
        SimpleDateFormat

      • getCurrentDate

        public static java.util.Date getCurrentDate()
        Return a date object representing the current system date/time
        Returns:
        the current system date/time

      • getCurrentDate

        public static java.lang.String getCurrentDate(java.lang.String format)
        Return the current system date/time formatted according to a SimpleDateFormat string of your choice
        Parameters:
        format - The desired format
        Returns:
        A String representing the current system date/time in the desired format.
